meanings.definition: Nymphs in Greek mythology who are connected to trees
meanings.sent1: The hamadryades danced gracefully around the ancient oak tree.
meanings.sent2: The hamadryades were believed to live within the trees they guarded.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the hamadryades were tree queens.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the hamadryades and the trees was as strong as family ties.
meanings.sent5: The whispering leaves seemed to echo the presence of the hamadryades.

meanings.definition: A type of tree-dwelling spirit in ancient Greek mythology
meanings.sent1: Legends say the hamadryades protected the forest with their magic.
meanings.sent2: The hamadryades were said to vanish if their tree was harmed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the hamadryades were invisible tree guardians.
meanings.sent4: The forest felt alive, as if the hamadryades breathed life into every leaf.
meanings.sent5: The ancient trees whispered secrets known only to the hamadryades.
